---

## 接口

**GET** `/public/futures/user/v1/public/copy-trade/leader-detail-v2`

## 请求参数

| 名称        | 类型   | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明              | 范围 |
| ----------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | ----------------- | ---- |
| `accountId` | number | 是   |        | leader account id |      |

## 示例请求

### Java

```java
public String leaderDetailGet(){


}
```

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "avatar": "",
    "currentFollowNumber": 0,
    "displayEquity": false,
    "displayPosition": false,
    "followNumber": 0,
    "label": [],
    "leadDays": 0, //Check-in time (days)
    "level": 0,
    "levelName": "",
    "maxFollowerSize": 0,
    "nickName": "",
    "profitRate": 0,
    "totalRights": 0
  }
}
```
